name: Bottomless Potion of the Tower
flavorText: When Royal Apothecary Jentulf said "If only there were a way to lessen the need for healing," Royal Blacksmith Akmmenn replied "I have an idea."
flavorTextHtml: When Royal Apothecary Jentulf said "If only there were a way to lessen the need for healing," Royal Blacksmith Akmmenn replied "I have an idea."
